column4: this might be sorta offtopic for this channel, but i recently restored a directory of backed up media from an external drive. a simple copy operation, however for a variety of small reasons i suspect the copy may not be perfect. which program could i use to generate a hash from a directory of files? md5sum seems to be confused by doing that
use rsync to update the copy ?
also; what problems are you seeing with the copy? maybe you messed up permissions copying to ntfs/fat filesystem or by not usng "cp -a"
